page.title: 05NORTH WITHAM
page.content: In number one Post Lane lived an almost ten year old called Matthew Fraser Betts with his younger brother of almost seven years old called Tom Fraser Betts and their mother Wendy Fraser Betts who lived with a 32 year old man called Kevin Barrett.They had five pets but if you include their chickens they had nine which were Oska cat,Foxey cat,Snuffles rabbit,Humbug rabbit,and dog Smithy.And in this village there were two farms.One was called The Hemstock Farm and the other was called The Spencers Farm,which is the bigger of the two farms.Or you could call the two farms Hemstocks Manor farm and Spencers would be called The Grange. The manor farm is one of the oldest houses in the village. Some of the others are the church (St Marys church ) and the Rectory which is being done up at the
